title: smtp failure
content: Just recently, I'm having trouble sending emails through Thunderbird. Receiving is fine. I have not made any changes to settings but I get smtp error when trying to send. I have 3 accounts and my gmail one works but not the other 2. The only difference I can see is the 2 that aren't working are POP3 whereas the gmail one is IMAP but surely that only affects receiving, not sending? Very occasionally an unsent email has miraculously been sent but mostly I get the smtp error. I checked with my ISP and they found not errors and suggested online webmail. Messages send fine through there but I'd rather use Thunderbird. Any suggestions please?
creator: greg152

title: Thunderbird detected a potential security threat and did not continue to localhost.
content:
Been using TB to check my gmail account for last few years, been working great. Then I had to update the Authentication method to OAuth2. Ended up having to delete the gmail account from TB, then come back & add it.

Now I can't add it, keep getting the following error message once I click on "Allow" button on Google screen saying "Mozilla TB Email wants to access your Google Account": "Warning: Potential Security Risk Ahead Thunderbird detected a potential security threat and did not continue to localhost. If you visit this site, attackers could try to steal information like your passwords, emails, or credit card details."

I have disabled Microsoft Defender & disabled my VPN (note: gmail worked just fine before with both of them enabled). Current Version: 115.13.0 (32-bit) Still cannot get past the above error message. I'm at a loss, don't know what else to do, can someone help me get my gmail account reinstalled on TB... How can I trace this problem out... Thank you.

title: Karakterkódolás beállítása
content:
Tisztelt Thunderbierd! Bizonyos levelek nem küldődnek el, ezért a másolatuk sem érkezik be hozzánk. Ezt a hibaüzenetet kapjuk: This E-mail message was determined to be Unicode-formatted but your E-mail reader does not support Unicode E-mail.

Please use an E-mail reader that supports POP3 with UTF-8 (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6856.html).

This can also happen when the sender's E-mail program does not correctly format the sent message.

The original message is included as a separate attachment so that it can be downloaded manually.

Mit kellene tennem , hogy az üzenetek rendesen el menjenek és a másolatuk hozzánk is beérkezzen??

Köszönettel Jokhel Róbert

title: Disk alanı yeterli olduğunu kontrol edin uyarısı
content: Thunderbird'de "e posta kutusuna yazılamıyor dosya sistemi yazma ayrıcalığını ve disk alanı yeterli olduğunu kontrol edin" uyarısı alıyorum. Disk alanım 1TB SSD ve 500GB dan fazla alan olmasına rağmen bu uyarıyı alıyorum. Bilgisayarımda disk dolana kadar maillerin bilgisayarıma indirilmesini eğer indirilmiyor ise mail sunucusundan göstermesi gerektiğini düşünüyorum. Acilen bu sorunun giderilmesi gerekiyor. Outlook da biz böyle bir sorun ile karşılaşmıyorduk. Bunu çözebileceğimiz birşey varmıdır geliştirici mi düzenleyecek. Saygı ve sevgilerimle.

title: PROBLEMI CONNESSIONE EMAIL
content:

il messaggio è precisamente questo: Accesso al server smtp-mail.outlook.com con nome utente xxxxxxx@hotmail.com non riuscito. oppure imtp-mail.outlook.com con nome utente xxxxxxx@hotmail.com non riuscito.

Ogni tanto si connette ugualmente e riesco a fare qualcosa, poi di colpo ancora messaggio di richiesta password e nuovamente errore non sono molto pratica e non ne riesco a venire a capo grazie a chi mi aiuterà Silvia

title: ¿Por qué las cuentas de Outlook buscan correos nuevos al iniciar Thunderbird pese a tenerlo deshabilitado?
content:
Hola. Trabajo con Thunderbird versión 115.13.0 y lo utilizo para manejar varias cuentas de correo tanto de Outlook como Gmail.

Esta semana recibí varios correos de Microsoft a todas mis cuentas de Outlook advirtiendo que ya no podía seguir utilizando el protocolo POP, y que me obligaban a utilizar IMAP con identificación OAuth2. Al no poder cambiar esto desde "Configuración de la cuenta", me vi obligado a eliminar todas las cuentas de Outlook y volverlas a crear de nuevo automáticamente para que se crearan bajo dicho protocolo y sistema de identificación.

El caso es que a pasar de que tengo configurado que no se busquen correos nuevos al iniciar Thunderbird, ni los busque tampoco mientras el programa está abierto, no respeta mi decisión y se buscan correos nuevos al iniciar y también si llega alguno mientras el programa permanece abierto.

Sin embargo con las cuentas de Gmail no me ocurre esto a pesar de tener el mismo protocolo y sistema de identificación.

Os proporciono una imagen de la configuración de todas mis cuentas.
creator: imnovix

title: How to correct a problem with message filter.
content:
Hi there

I have a probably easy to solve issue that has been causing a lot of headaches of late. Previously, as seen in the screenshot, if I wanted to filter out messages say from "PC-welt" or contained that term, I just needed to type that term in the searchbox shown and immediately all messages with it would automatically be sorted out, without even hitting the search button. One can for example then do a bulk deletion. That screenshot would be showing a list of messages with "pc-welt", say in the senders info or subject.

For some reason I yet do not know, this has ceased happening and in fact as shown, nothing happens at all, even after hitting the search button. Why is this and how can I come back to THIS function? If one uses the "Quich filter", which I DO NOT LIKE, the results are opened in a new tab and not in a form like the preferred option. I do not remember making any Thunderbird filter settings and if I did then unintended. How can I get back to the function of just typing a term, with all results being immediately filtered within that window so I can for example select and delete them?

I have the latest version 115.13.0 (64-bit) (portable)

Thank you in advance.
creator: simbats4z
